Class TrackSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Plottables
      • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.TrackWrapper_Support.BaseItemLayer
        • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.TrackSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, java.util.EventListener, CanEnumerate, Editable, GriddableSeriesMarker, HasEditables, Layer, Layers.NeedsWrappingInLayerManager, Plottable, PlottablesType, Renamable, DraggableItem, SupportsPropertyListeners

    CoreTMASegment, DynamicInfillSegment, PlanningSegment

    public class TrackSegment
extends TrackWrapper_Support.BaseItemLayer
implements DraggableItem, GriddableSeriesMarker, Layers.NeedsWrappingInLayerManager
